website_summaries.verdict: For home cooks who want the traditional look of hammered copper, but the performance of stainless steel. The pieces are sturdy, and the handles and lids are well-constructed. May not be induction ready.
pros: Vintage European quality at an impressive price point
Hammered copper exterior is worthy of display
Oven-safe to 500 degrees, with a tri-ply cooking surface
cons: Copper layer may not be thick enough for functionality
Discoloration and pitting are common complaints
Requires diligent hand washing and polishing

website_summaries.verdict: If you want a copper cookware set but are watching your budget, the Calphalon set is the best choice for you.
pros: Has similar features to the Calphalon set- tri-ply construction, 10 pieces, and a lifetime warranty
The main difference is the copper exterior that has a hammered finish
cons: Consumers commented that the cookware has the tendency to stick, and though it's similar to our best value pick in features, it has a higher price

customer_reviews.title: Complete Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about these. My husband and I received these from our wedding registry. I’m an avid cook, and decided to try these out even though some had said the copper color comes off. Well we used them once, on medium heat, and within 15 minutes all of the copper color was off (leaving a dirty, gold color. I would not recommend buying. I’m very disappointed in this product. We returned them to Sur la Table and received excellent customer service there.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: USE THIS SCRUUBY TO CLEAN THESE
customer_reviews.text: These are great. One MUST use a 100 percent NYLON scrubby as stated by manufacturer. This company recommended Scotch Brite products , but they scratch. After doing my own lengthy research, I found some that were great. Keep your warranty and pans beautiful by using these, found on Amazon : Crochet Pot Scrubbers Set of Four Car Rim Cleaners Nylon Scrubbies Sold by: Knit and Crochet Gal
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Today I am revising my original review after using the pots and pans for 1-1/2 months. This set definitely works well. But the 6-qt pot has staining on the inside bottom. None of the other pots & pans appear to have this condition. Having been in the metals industry for 25+ years, the staining appears to be rust-like. Possible inferior metal or improper storage at the manufacturer and/or distributor??? I hand wash and hand dry, then store my pots immediately. Also, I do not use metal instruments or harsh abrasives on this set. I will contact the company and post updates to this review.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Set
customer_reviews.text: Been using this set for a month now and I love it far more than my Calphalon. Good quality, good weight, easy cleanup. Yes, the copper will darken with use. This is not an indication of quality, it's simply a reaction of the copper metal to heat. Get some copper polish and after a few uses polish is and it's good as new. This was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible to cook with or clean
customer_reviews.text: I have had them for almost 2 years now. Using an electric stove melted the bottom of one pot within the first few months and it's distorted permanently. The food sticks so badly while cooking no matter what I do to just the large pan only. Doing dishes this morning I am noticing that the copper is starting to chip off. I have had it! Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Buckley-Lizardi

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about these. The issues started as soon as we unboxed these pans. Well we used them once, on medium heat, and within 15 minutes all of the copper color was off and my food was burned I have scrubbed/soaked them and they still do not look clean. I have only had these for two days.As you can see in the pictures bellow. I would not recommend buying this product at all. I’m very disappointed in this product. I am going to return them today.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Terrible pot & pan set! Take my advice and DO NOT purchase this set. The copper on the outside stains/fades. Within two uses my pans looked yellow instead of copper. Food sticks terribly even with oil/butter & the inside of the pots & pans are stained. I have scrubbed/soaked them and they still do not look clean. I have only had these for 5 months and I am already looking to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I went into this a little fearful that I wouldn't be able to maintain them even with proper care due to some of the scare stories. I've had them for about a month, have used every single one and once had the magenta coloration happen but using wright's copper cream, helped it go back to BRAND NEW. Read the instructions buy the copper cream and after every two uses polish it. Your pans will remain as new as the day you unpackaged them! Absolutely love these. My family has been using lagostina since the 70s!
customer_reviews.author: Sevc23

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT nonstick
customer_reviews.text: While their appearance is everything I hoped for, the function of these pots is immensely disappointing. The “nonstick surface” is not nonstick. The pans I was replacing are 5-10 years old, and their nonstick lining even as scratched and degraded as it is, leaves me with less scrubbing and mess than this brand new (and rather pricey) set. If I hadn’t thrown out the box I would return these today.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Want to spend more time washing dishes?
customer_reviews.text: Do you like to spend hours washing dishes? Do you love to scrub caked-on, burned, or just plain stuck-on food from your cookware? Well if so, these are the pans for you. These pans can bond to almost any food surface; eggs, cheese, pasta, and burgers, seem to permanently attach to the sides of these pans. For optimum use, purchase with a large case of brillo brand pot scrubbers and prepare to pre-soak you pans making clean-up time extend a little longer into your daily activities.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you burn something, it’s all over.
customer_reviews.text: I am so very disappointed in this product! I made stove top popcorn in the large pot twice and second time burned the bottom. I soaked and cleaned for hours as directed using bar keepers friend plus the non-scratch scrubbies. Nothing will get the popcorn off. Such a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: but it is so hefty and solid I know it will be awesome. I may have to get a ceiling rack ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh. MY. GOSH. I never write reviews, but I am so blown away by the quality and beauty of this set, I must. Haven't even cooked with it yet, but it is so hefty and solid I know it will be awesome. I may have to get a ceiling rack so everyone can just appreciate the quality and beauty. So happy.
customer_reviews.author: Freelancer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cookware Set
customer_reviews.text: These were a splurge/xmas gift to myself the first Christmas in my house, plus I had a gift card. They do take a little more effort to clean and keep the copper finish shining than a cheap set of non-stick cookware (use a copper polish on the outside and it brightens right up), but I find it worth it. The heat distribution is far better and I use fairly low temperature settings to get better results. Definitely hoping to add more pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had to send them back
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look of these but when they arrived, there were enough issues that I had to send them back. There were pit marks and staining and a few other issues. Not the quality I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: VICDFL

customer_reviews.title: Hammered copper will discolor when used.
customer_reviews.text: I was sooo excited to get my hammered copper Lagostina cookware set. Absolutely beautiful set! However, I cooked in one of my skillet last night and the potatoes stuck so bad to the pan and the copper on the bottom discolored and scratched with this 1st use! I even washed them as directed in the instruction book. That was a real let down. If you want awesome looking cookware, this is a great choice but if you want easy durable cookware you may want to research other options.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia  Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: We love Lagostina!
customer_reviews.text: I have to address the fact that they are not made in Italy, they higher end ones are but this collection. That said the quality is really there, they're pleasent to look at but more importantly fantastic to cook with. They're not for everyone out the box, but if you know how to cook or willing to learn you'll get the hang of it very easily. My mom has had her set fot almost 40 years now and I can see these lasting that long as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid of buying this set because of the low qualifications and reviews. However I’ve been using for a month or so and I am completely happy . Specially investment vs benefit. Set is beautiful , easy to clean if you use a powder detergent (powder Ajax or so) to erase white dots remaining after Cooking. Definitely not a non stick product. Perfect for Cooking / boiling/ steam/ oven/ etc. To fry eggs or Making perfect pancakes, you’ll need a non stick pan aside.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: SO disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about these copper pans. I used one of the pans ONCE on medium heat to cook some eggs. Suddenly I noticed the pain was HOT PINK. I was hoping once it cooled down it would change back to copper color? Nope. The pan is now bright pink. Sending them back right away. What a bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: The heavy construction means it will last a long time. The handles are cool touch which is such a plus. If you don't know how to care for stainless steel cookery (only cook on non-stick) then this is not for you. These pans will last a lifetime and I am so happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These pots and pans are beautifully finished. Nice and heavy
customer_reviews.text: These pots and pans are beautifully finished. Nice and heavy, solid feel. Seem to retain heat very well, and cook evenly. They are so nice to look at, that I had to install hooks to hang them in the kitchen. Too pretty to put in a cabinet. Not sure on long term reliability yet, but I would guess that we will not need any new pots/pans for quite a while, if ever
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Best pans I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing pans. They look great and work even better. Yhe heat distribution is marvelous and my food has been cooking better and more even. Now as most people have said these can discolor from use however if after washing you use some copper butter on them as directed you will see that the color is restored. Thisnosnto be expected as these are not low quality pans. They are a high quality cooking product and as such need to be maintained regularly. Similar to a nice set of knives or a high end vehicle you need to maintain them you dont just let them wear down.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W.

customer_reviews.title: why put the SUPER sticky sticker on the inside of EVERY SINGLE POT ...
customer_reviews.text: The issues started as soon as we unboxed these pans. First of all, why put the SUPER sticky sticker on the inside of EVERY SINGLE POT AND PAN?!??!! Not horrible, but seriously, why even do this to begin with? After 1 cook on medium/low heat the medium size Pam has NO copper color left. I'm posting this review on my cell phone and have to figure out how to add pictures, but will add them as soon as I can. Horrible for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Handle and Lids are heat up too easily
customer_reviews.text: Great Variety in sizes and shapes. The handle and the lids heat up very quickly though unfortunately on a gas stove oven and can easily burn yourself if not careful.
customer_reviews.author: PeterL

customer_reviews.title: What a steal!
customer_reviews.text: I got these of daily deals and only paid $100 for them. With that being said I suspected that I was paying for the name not necessarily quality. NOT TRUE!!! These are very highly quality. Absolutely love them glad I took a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning. Was surprised at the heft and sturdiness of the cookware. Did my homework on the upkeep as any consumer should do before purchasing. Wanted to upgrade my cookware set since I moved out on my own almost 4 years ago and my first set was just some cheap k mart 30 dollar pans. Time for some adult cookware 😂
customer_reviews.author: Veridiana mireles

customer_reviews.title: Happy Wife, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Use Bartender's Friend for the stainless cladding, and copper cleaner for, eell, the copper. They're versatile, affordable, and look too good to be kept in a cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: SixFactor

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those "lifetime" sets. Very heavyweight and beautiful. I gave them to my daughter as a housewarming gift. I received a similar 18/10 stainless set as a wedding gift back in 1984. I still use them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: cw410

customer_reviews.title: Stains with heat
customer_reviews.text: We were very disappointed that Lagostina skillets and pans discolor when frying or cooking over high heat.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L. Baird

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these pot and pans. I will never purchase teflon garbage again. Though I have not put a non stick coating on these, just using some oil or butter works. These heat evenly, are built very well.
customer_reviews.author: nv

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heat transfer
customer_reviews.text: We have had this set for 4 months now and "medium is the new high". They cook wonderfully, however some oils (like vegetable oil) will take a bit more elbow grease to clean. I highly recommend de-glazing the skillets immediately after using to help keep them clean. I've used whatever cooking wine, vinegar, water, and even some rum to get the "bits" up after cooking. We use Wrights Copper Cleaner once a month on the outside and Barkeeper's Friend on the stainless as needed. Recommend for anyone who wants a nice set of copper clad cookware.
customer_reviews.author: pabloxz

customer_reviews.title: Cooks well,Durable, easy to clean,best cookware
customer_reviews.text: As it goes by our grandparents stainless steel cookware is always better when are little heavy. That kind of cookware wont burn the food and heats fast and heats evenly. Im really surprised by my new no burnt food, And its very very easy to clean with sponge and dishwasher. Im totaly satisfied and happy to use this product and will recommend to every one.
customer_reviews.author: Bhavna

customer_reviews.title: Copper feels forever
customer_reviews.text: They were beautiful but after my tenants destroyed them I’m in process of refurbishing them. Less expensive then the hardcore copper sets but as elegant and effectIve I’m avoiding aluminum and Teflon which are highly toxic.
customer_reviews.author: Daniesza

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO CLEAN & DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with my Lagostina set. I wanted the copper set but it was not in my budget. I am however very pleased with the results since using this set. I thought I'd be scrubbing to clean the stuck on grease but it comes off so easily. I love the design and durability. They are very sturdy and strong. Would highly recomment this set.
customer_reviews.author: GayA de Quay

customer_reviews.title: A worth while investment for sure.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good. It should last a lifetime. I bought another set for my daughter so she’ll have something that should last her for a long long time also.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift choice for a cook
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son as a gift - he's an excellent cook. He told us that this set has all the conduction of good copper pans and the ease of cleaning that the stainless steel or aluminum (not sure which) provides on the cooking surface.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Levitt

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love. Easy to clean. Don’t have to worry about coating pealing off.
customer_reviews.author: D Brixey

customer_reviews.title: Color faded after only one use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because of its shining coating. It matches with the Moscow Mule cups I have. When I received it, I was so happy and impressed by its look. However, after only one time use, the color faded and since it is not non-stick, it is not easy to clean compare to my other pots.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Roses

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Love these pans new to electric flat top stoves and these worked out great
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great cooking set!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pots and pan set!! Food does not stick and they are super easy to clean! They are my favorite cooking set I’ve had yet 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Nichole Villard

customer_reviews.title: We love these copper pans!
customer_reviews.text: We love this pan set! Absolutely amazing and just gorgeous! We use them everyday! It is worth pointing out: heat causes normal discoloration with copper—I know it says it somewhere in the description. With that, you can tell which pans we use the most by how much discoloration they’ve experienced. I’ll be purchasing a copper cleaner soon. It 100% does not bother me that need to use a special cleaner on them every once in a while. These pans were worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: From the stove to the table
customer_reviews.text: These pots are great. Haven't had a chance to treuly use them but so far, I am quite happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these are pretty disappointing. One use and they become very damaged. This picture is even after a thorough scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy & gets too hot
customer_reviews.text: The pots are very heavy, so when food is added, they're very, very heavy. Also, the handles on the covers get very hot - too hot to handle without a pot holder...
customer_reviews.author: Esther M.

customer_reviews.title: Thin copper. But decent pans
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time believing these are even made of copper. I've owned my for about 4 months now and some have changed from copper to more yellow in color. I do like the pans though. Although I miss my non stick pans on occasion. I will give these things a lot of credit for looks, they are attractive. I enjoy cooking on them, and so long as you immediately wash it they clean easy enough. However, they were what I was expecting. They seem more copper plated, and a very thin covering of copper to boot.
customer_reviews.author: gwb

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality and value of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Chaya Grant

customer_reviews.title: One of the best quality and durability 😊
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It's quite expensive compared to other deals, trust me you will enjoy every penny you spend on this. I gifted this to my mom. I recommended this to all my friends. Owning this cookware I enjoy cooking. The pans are not greezy. It's very easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lids are meh
customer_reviews.text: One of the kids came dentend. And the edges of them bend eAsily other than that great set
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: High quality very nice stainless steel set! I was so satisfied when I seen it that I immediately ordered one more for my mom
customer_reviews.author: Alen Hurem

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!  Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Cooks evenly, beautiful craftsmanship, great quality! My favorite cookware ever!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Feel strong and are lasting
customer_reviews.text: Bought them last thanksgiving, and loving them. I have a pan for most dishes now.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Product tarnished after the first couple uses.
customer_reviews.text: This product easily tarnished and looks rough after the first couple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: look nice, made some good meals so far
customer_reviews.text: look nice, made some good meals so far. a little light, have to watch the heat a bit more than i am used to with my last set of cookware( full stainless steel w/ copper core ). I like the tarnish they get. wish the lids were glass. value for the quality seems reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the bride and groom love
customer_reviews.text: bought as a wedding present from a group of people, the bride and groom love them
customer_reviews.author: Kim Soetaert

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love these! By far the best money I have spent on pots and pans!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Truell

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this stainless steel set. Heavy but not overly, clean up is a breeze and food cooks evenly. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Russell T Powell

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy cooking and cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: What a great price on a great product - give your coated pots and pans to Goodwill and discover what quality copper ware can do for your cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The color fades after a few uses and gives rainbow color stains. Horrible
customer_reviews.author: Leah Yebri

customer_reviews.title: Love this set.
customer_reviews.text: This set is just amazing! Cooks beautifully. If you notice it's starting to look tarnished bring out the copper polish. I was getting a little upset that after a month of very frequent use this set was looking years old. I used copper polish today and now, good as new! I recommend polshing your most frequently used every other week.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: They are good
customer_reviews.text: They look lovely and you can cook well with them but when using the frying Pan it burns the food.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: They are great. I love all the sizes I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Namu

customer_reviews.title: It's
customer_reviews.text: I loved the handle shape, the way it cooks food and most of all how easy itis to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice set of cookware for the money
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie P. Gillikin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and beautiful. It's a joy to cook with them.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Renee Pacana

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Cook without Them!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set for my husband who could not be more pleased. They are very heavy and provide even cooking as well are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: amieg

customer_reviews.title: Best quality that I’ve seen and people seem to not ...
customer_reviews.text: Best quality that I’ve seen and people seem to not know how to use them the correct way and with that said people give a bad response. There meant for slow cooking and low temps.
customer_reviews.author: johnny cabrera jr

customer_reviews.title: Pretty beautiful but one pot looks like used
customer_reviews.text: In general I love this set. The bronze color and grain is beautiful, the food cooked taste also good. The only thing is one pot looks like used with burned mark
customer_reviews.author: Paras

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in excellent condition, even more beautiful than the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in excellent condition , even more beautiful than the pictures !!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Snell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful high end pans for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: These pans are gorgeous and for the price, can't be beat. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: just another guy

customer_reviews.title: OMG! BUY THESE POTS; they're spectacular
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I cannot believe I waited 25 years to have pots and pans that are this incredible. I've tried everything, Calphaplon (multiple sets), Ceramic, etc... only to be disappointed. This set comes with my the highest recommendation possible. YOU WILL LOVE THEM! They're SPECTACULAR. The cost is no more than I spent on my other sets. What took me so long to come around... I don't know??? Nothing is sticking; I can't stop cooking ;D It's simple, just hand wash really well before use and they're ready to go. BUY THESE POTS... the quality is real. Sincerely, Sherry
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Elshaug

customer_reviews.title: But we love it. Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure I wanted to order such a large item on line without holding and feeling it. But we love it. Perfect, you use less heat. very durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay product.
customer_reviews.text: Cooks fine so far. Had spotting on the bottom of some pans out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the pots & pans. The copper gets dirty which I didn't realize. Guess I need to buy cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Kingstones

customer_reviews.title: Will never have to buy another set of pans ever again!!!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best set for the money. Beautifully crafted heavy true copper pan set!! Have had mine for months now and adore it!! I loved it so much we found lagostina utensils and bought those to match - had to find them on the amazon.uk.com site but still well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: trailerwatcher

customer_reviews.title: Love it, so gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I just had to have it, and I love it. I am amazed the handles never get hot! I was certain I would burn myself. One negative is I prefer glass tops so I can see what is going on. Also I wish there was a smaller saucepan.
customer_reviews.author: Frank in Va

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The set is pretty on the stove. But, my older than dirt 7-ply out performs this 3-ply set. The quart pans do what they're supposed to do. The Fry pans are absolutely Horrible to cook with.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Padgett

customer_reviews.title: NOT INDUCTION COMPATIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this because it is suppose to be induction compatible if you ask that question. IT IS NOT INDUCTION COMPATIBLE!! Thanks for the false info.
customer_reviews.author: spk

customer_reviews.title: Good but: made in China (not Europe) and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Good but: made in China (not Europe) and it is NOT dishwasher safe. It is a good product for sure, beautiful to show too but I would have preferred to find those two pieces of information between the first lines of description on the web, instead of printed on the box (made in China) or on the bottom of the web page (not dishwasher safe). Anyway, they really do their job well, let’s see what the passing of time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Fabrizio

customer_reviews.title: not happy at all with this product
customer_reviews.text: I have had these pot for about two weeks now. They are already starting to loose there color and also they are full of water stains . Even after the instruction say that they need to be dried after each use. not happy at all with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this set
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at these since December and finally purchased them. Haven't used them yet, but they look beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Pauletta J Darilek

customer_reviews.title: Beautil but not veey pratical
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, but not very practical. They must be polished with copper cleaner in order to not have spots and smears. Even if cleaned through. I use them more for decoration than cooking now.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan, Clarissa, Anissa

customer_reviews.title: Forgot how fun it is to cook on pots that I'm not ...
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a set of pots that got scratch within a months of owning it. Forgot how fun it is to cook on pots that I'm not worrying about scratching d pot. Food doesn't stick to it and easy to clean. Worth d money.
customer_reviews.author: Bc6

customer_reviews.title: it is not the typical patena look like that your copper pans get
customer_reviews.text: if i could give zero stars, i would. i have already exchanged them once. after the first use, and they are magenta. one of them is literally white. i understand the tarnishing effect copper gets, but these are hideous. it is not the typical patena look like that your copper pans get. very displeased. i will be returning round two as well. i could see if they were a sixty dollar set of pans, i paid close to four hundred and have seen them at fine department stores for eight!!
customer_reviews.author: Camie H.

customer_reviews.title: they're beautiful to look at
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan. they're beautiful to look at!! But, to use, they're not user friendly what so ever! It's a full time job just to keep them clean and pretty. the inside of the pots seam to tarnish as well and I don't want to use bartender keeper on the inside where we cook food. I'm not sure what to do as this as a very expensive purchase and if I had bought them at a store, I would most definitely be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: bakemeapatticake

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but they are not dishwasher safe which was not clearly stated on website description.
customer_reviews.author: Beth W.

customer_reviews.title: Copper dissapeared on the first use😢
customer_reviews.text: We used it for the first time to make scrambled eggs and it ended up looking like this. I'm very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was VERY disappointed when the copper color started fading after the 1st ...
customer_reviews.text: Pans work as expected. I was VERY disappointed when the copper color started fading after the 1st wash.... they looked like i owned them for MANY years after the first few washes.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They look absolutely gorgeous. My wife is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed that this product is marketed with a copper layer
customer_reviews.text: Copper thickness was not memtioned but after washing the cookware once, the copper layer is already disappearing. Really disappointed that this product is marketed with a copper layer. You get what you pay for i guess!
customer_reviews.author: Frederic H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very please with the quality of the pots and pans
customer_reviews.author: Keegan T.

customer_reviews.title: Even after learning to cook with them, they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Even after learning to cook with them, they are still hard to clean and the copper has to be polished after every use... With 4 children and a busy life, there is no time to polish pots and pans... I wish I could return them...
customer_reviews.author: Peterson 10

customer_reviews.title: NOT non-stick
customer_reviews.text: We got the Stainless Steel Copper. They look great and we were really exited about them, but they are definitely NOT non stick. The cooking surfaces are a pain to clean. For this reason I would not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: SDE

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product to
customer_reviews.text: No a high quality set. Copper finish is degraded after use and the stainless steel underneath starts to show through immediately. I would not recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just okay, bottoms are more rounded than flat.
customer_reviews.text: Just okay. For the price you can't really expect perfection. They arent as durable as most multiclad sets out there, but will do in a pinch. The worst part about this set is that the bottom of the pots and pans aren't flat (more rounded), so they wont sit flush with with your cooktop if you have an electric/induction range. Not only is this super annoying, but also poses a safety risk: never try to stir these pots one-handed, you will get burned!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Nowicki

customer_reviews.title: Cooks wonderfully and cleans easily!
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews about them discoloring are phooey. Yes, it is copper and it does react when on heat and they do turn colors, but a tiny bit of polish every once in a while and they're good as new. We've had ours for several months now and even went a while without polishing them, letting them get all discolored. Got the polish out the other day and they shined up good as new. We also cook on an electric flat top and they distribute heat wonderfully. So very easy to clean off burnt on stuff too. Could not be happier with them!
customer_reviews.author: incertus.divinus

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pots and pans!
customer_reviews.text: The best pots and pans we have ever purchased! Don't second guess yourself on this one, I purchased these last year for my 32 year old daughter and she said she would never cook with anything else! I finally broke down and purchased a set for my us. My husband could not be happier! I must say they clean up so easily with a small amount of bar keepers friend and keep that like new appearance. Definitely a great purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful pots and pans. Sticker on inside of pans, I would prefer they had not done it that way. Other than that, yes you must season the pan. You should expect to shine copper to maintain it. They heat up fast, they hold heat very well, they are gorgeous when well cared for. I use the lemon and salt method outside, and heat oil inside to season just as with a cast iron pan. Fabulously non-stick, get the flavors of your food instead of having it turn to mush. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Devlynn

customer_reviews.title: ... these about a month now and they have been wonderful. heat up nice and evenly
customer_reviews.text: we have had these about a month now and they have been wonderful. heat up nice and evenly, and clean up well. we use some bar keepers friend to keep the copper looking amazing. i actually enjoy watching the copper change into beautiful colors while cooking since we can shine them up nice and pretty rather easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kmh_themom

customer_reviews.title: Well made set.
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful and have a nice hefty weight. The handles are rounded in a way that are comfortable to hold. Having not used them yet all I can say is I am very impressed with the look and feel of them compared to much more expensive high end brands I've handled in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: OK so I bought this mostly for decorative purposes I had a corner sink and awkward space above so I decided on a pot rack and these are mostly used for cosmetic purposes but it looks absolutely beautiful and that empty corner is filled. They are very nice quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy and enjoy a new level of cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Love the set. One needs to know how to use this cookware correctly. Once understood, it's a lovely addition to my kitchen. It's exciting to saute onions and cook up a white sauce from a good roux. Buy and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei O'Connor

product_meta.title: Lagostina Martellata Hammered Copper 18/10 Tri-Ply Stainless Steel Cookware Set, 10-Piece, Copper
product_meta.description: Style Name:Copper Set with SS Lid| Size:10-PieceThis range presents offers tri ply stainless steel construction with a thick radiating core and copper exterior to ensure fast and even heating throughout the whole pan. The set includes: 8"" skillet, 10"" skillet, 2Qt saucepan with lid, 3Qt saucepan with lid, 3Qt deep saute pan with lid, 6Qt stockpot with lid. Each of our Lagostina hammered copper products are carefully crafted to provide you with a durable, timeless Product. While copper is outstanding at conducting heat, the metal does become naturally discolored after normal use. This does not effect the performance of our products in any way, but we understand the importance of retaining the beauty of copper. To do so, follow these three easy steps: to restore our copper cookware to its original glow, first, rinse the pot or pan thoroughly. Next, using a small sponge or cloth, apply a copper cleaning solution to the Product. Once the copper cleaner has been fully administered to the pot or pan, rinse it and dry. If there are still areas that seem to be discolored, repeat the process until the original Color and shine are restored.
feature_bullets: Tri ply construction; Features an aluminum core clad between two layers of stainless steel which gives even heat throughout the entire pan
Hammered stainless steel exterior: Beautiful hammered finish that adds a touch of warmth and elegance to the family table
Premium stainless steel surface: Highest grade stainless maintains purity of flavors and is great for searing
Stainless steel lids: Stainless steel lids fit tightly to seal in moisture and flavor.Nylon scrubbing pads are safe to use
Cast stainless steel handles: Fully cast and riveted to bring strength and stability over a lifetime of use
Flared edges: Rolled edges on the pan make it easy to pour out liquids to avoid messes
